mapper.sql: etop.id AS etop_id,etop.transfer_order_id AS etop_transfer_order_id,etop.product_id AS etop_product_id,etop.product_sku_id AS etop_product_sku_id,etop.product_count AS etop_product_count,etop.is_new AS etop_is_new,etop.data_status AS etop_data_status,etop.remark AS etop_remark,etop.create_time AS etop_create_time,etop.create_user AS etop_create_user,etop.update_time AS etop_update_time,etop.update_user AS etop_update_user,etop.product_sku_snapshot AS etop_product_sku_snapshot

etom.id AS etom_id,etom.transfer_order_id AS etom_transfer_order_id,etom.material_id AS etom_material_id,etom.material_no AS etom_material_no,etom.material_count AS etom_material_count,etom.is_new AS etom_is_new,etom.data_status AS etom_data_status,etom.remark AS etom_remark,etom.create_time AS etom_create_time,etom.create_user AS etom_create_user,etom.update_time AS etom_update_time,etom.update_user AS etom_update_user,etom.material_snapshot AS etom_material_snapshot
mapper.select: SELECT FROM erp_transfer_order eto WHERE eto.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND eto.data_status = 1

SELECT count(eto.id) FROM erp_transfer_order eto
AND eto.data_status = 1
SELECT FROM erp_transfer_order eto where eto.transfer_order_no = #{transferOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND eto.data_status = 1

SELECT ,,,ew.warehouse_name FROM( select from erp_transfer_order eto where eto.transfer_order_no = #{transferOrderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_status = 1 ) eto left join erp_transfer_order_product etop on etop.transfer_order_id = eto.id and etop.data_status =1 left join erp_transfer_order_material etom on etom.transfer_order_id = eto.id and etom.data_status =1 LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ew ON ew.id = eto.warehouse_id and ew.data_status =1

SELECT ,,,ew.warehouse_name FROM( select from erp_transfer_order eto where eto.id = #{transferOrderId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and data_status = 1 ) eto left join erp_transfer_order_product etop on etop.transfer_order_id = eto.id and etop.data_status =1 left join erp_transfer_order_material etom on etom.transfer_order_id = eto.id and etom.data_status =1 LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ew ON ew.id = eto.warehouse_id and ew.data_status =1
